lyric:
[by:Trap_Girl]
[00:10.18]Took you like a shot
[00:11.28]Thought that I could chase you with the cold evening
[00:13.71]Let a couple years water down
[00:15.25]How I'm feeling about you (feeling about you)
[00:18.07]And every time we talk
[00:20.67]Every single word builds up to this moment
[00:22.91]And I gotta convince myself I don’t want it,
[00:25.35]Even though I do (even though I do)
[00:27.97]You could break my heart in two
[00:31.09]But when it heals, it beats for you
[00:33.50]I know its forward but it's true
[00:37.59]I wanna hold you when I'm not supposed to
[00:42.53]When I’m lying close to someone else
[00:46.60]You're stuck in my head and I can't get you out of it
[00:51.85]If I could do it all again
[00:54.20]I know I'd go back to you
[01:03.57]I know I'd go back to you
[01:13.11]I know I'd go back to you
[01:15.82]We never got it right
[01:17.15]Playing and replaying old conversations
[01:19.59]Overthinking every word and I hate it
[01:21.83]'Cause it's not me (’Cause it’s not me)
[01:24.22]And what's the point in hiding
[01:26.52]And everybody knows we got unfinished business
[01:28.91]And I regret it if I didn’t say
[01:30.76]This isn't what it could be (isn't what it could be)
[01:33.32]You could break my heart in two
[01:36.84]But when it heals, it beats for you
[01:39.34]I know its forward but it's true
[01:41.66]I wanna hold you when I’m not supposed to
[01:48.35]When I'm lying close to someone else
[01:52.65]You're stuck in my head and I can't get you out of it
[01:57.64]If I could do it all again
[02:00.16]I know I'd go back to you (go back to you go back to you go back to you)
[02:09.83]I know I'd go back to you
[02:11.82]I'd go back to you
[02:13.29]I'd go back to you
[02:15.85]What was there wasn't sure
[02:18.05]But I'd go back to you
[02:20.00]I know I'd go back to you
[02:21.79]You can break my heart in two
[02:24.06]But when it heals, it beats for you
[02:26.50]I know its forward but it's true
[02:28.80]Won't lie, I'd go back to you
[02:31.24]You know, my thoughts are running loose
[02:33.49]It's just a thing you make me do
[02:35.82]And I could fight, but what's the use
[02:38.21]I know I'd go back to you
[02:39.92]I wanna hold you when I'm not supposed to
[02:44.78]When I'm lying close to someone else
[02:49.02]You're stuck in my head and I can't get you out of it
[02:54.14]If I could do it all again
[02:56.48]I know I'd go back to you
[02:58.93]I'd go back to you
[03:03.60]I'd go back to you
[03:06.54]I know I'd go back to you
[03:08.51]I'd go back to you I'd go back to you
[03:15.64]I know I'd go back to you
[03:17.88](Go back to you, go back to you)
[03:20.25](Go back to you, go back to you)
[03:22.48](Go back to you, go back to you)(Go back to you)

lyric:
[00:01.970]作曲 : 言寺
[00:04.670]作词 : 言寺
[00:10.080]你陪我步入蝉夏 越过城市喧嚣
[00:16.370]歌声还在游走 你榴花般的双眸
[00:21.590]不见你的温柔 丢失花间欢笑
[00:27.560]岁月无法停留 流云的等候
[00:33.600]我真的好想你 在每一个雨季
[00:38.750]你选择遗忘的 是我最不舍的
[00:43.790]纸短情长啊 道不尽太多涟漪
[00:49.060]我的故事都是关于你呀
[00:53.430]怎么会爱上了他 并决定跟他回家

lyric:
[00:00.04]I met this shy boy, cute as hell and grabbed him by the hand
[00:05.35]He pulled me back, I asked what's wrong
[00:07.32]He said, "Oh, I can't dance"
[00:09.67]I said, "That's fine, just keep in time and show off what you got"
[00:14.13]If you mess up, boy, I won't mind as long as you don't stop
[00:18.52]Woah, na na, don't stop
[00:20.79]Oh, na na, don't stop
[00:23.27]Even if you can't dance just hold my hips
[00:25.59]Hold my hands while I roll my hips
[00:27.92]Even if you can't dance I'll handle it
[00:30.00]Follow me and don't stop
[00:32.23]Even if you can't dance, don't stand and watch

[00:41.05]Oh, na na, don't stop
[00:43.16]Woah, na na, don't stop
[00:49.92]Keep your eyes on me (woo!)
[00:54.28]Singing I'ma teach you a lesson
[00:56.50]You just gotta move in my direction
[00:58.80]Keep your eyes on me
[01:03.32]Being all anxious ain't an option
[01:05.39]Baby, I ain't got no plans of stopping
[01:07.56]Woah, na na, don't stop
[01:10.10]Oh, na na, don't stop
[01:12.65]Even if you can't dance just hold my hips

lyric:
[by:Aicko]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Keeley Osborn Bumford/Justin Blau/William Rappaport/Henri Lanz/Frederick Falke
[00:00.96]Dancing through a hurricane
[00:04.90]Soaked in technicolor rain
[00:08.58]Time is melting in my brain
[00:16.26]Paint the roses black as night
[00:20.17]Swimming with the satellites
[00:23.89]Never wanna know, never wanna let go
[00:30.99]No, don't wake me yet, don't give it away
[00:35.18]Hold my breath, I just wanna stay and
[00:39.09]Lose myself tonight
[00:41.95]I'm drifting away through the flashing lights
[00:45.73]I just wanna stay out here alone, I can dance on my own
[00:53.58]I just wanna stay out here alone, I can dance on my own
[01:17.37]And I can't wait no more, I'm drifting away
[01:21.28]What you waiting for?
[01:23.96]I just wanna stay out here alone, we can dance on our own
[01:48.10]Give me just one reason why we can't believe our eyes
[01:51.92]Running with the season 'till it makes us realize
[01:56.15]We got it all, we got it all for us
[02:03.53]I can't wait to see the sun arriving with the rain
[02:07.30]Take my hand, we're diving into passionate terrain
[02:11.68]We got it all, we got it all for us
[02:19.10]Lose myself tonight (lose myself)
[02:21.90]I'm drifting away through the flashing lights
[02:25.40]I just wanna stay out here alone, I can dance on my own
name: On My Own (3LAU Electro Remix)
